error.messages.nick.small: HAHA! I barely see your nickname!
error.messages.email.small: Impossible for this to be an email!
error.messages.email.big: I can't register you with a very large email.
error.messages.email.format: In what world would that be an email?
error.messages.password.small: Put a few more characters and I'll let you in.
error.messages.password.big: You're writing a book in the password field?
error.messages.password.required: I didn't like your security without using a password!
